title: The Social Network
plotSummary: The story of the founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed.
fullDescription: The Social Network is a gripping biographical drama that chronicles the meteoric rise of Facebook and its controversial founder Mark Zuckerberg. Set against the backdrop of Harvard University but socially awkward computer programmer to the world's youngest billionaire. As he revolutionizes social connectivity and creates a global phenomenon, he faces fierce legal battles with former friends and business partners who claim they were cheated out of their rightful shares.

title: Joker
